roleset.name: less than ideal

role.descr: thing that is less than ideal

example.name: arg1
example.text: Outside CTA of the abdomen , pelvis , and lower extremities dated 6-8-06 : The film quality is suboptimal because of technical issues of the scanning protocol and the extensive amount of arterial calcification .
example.arg: because of technical issues of the scanning protocol and the extensive amount of arterial calcification

example.name: both args
example.text: Urologists' and GPs' knowledge of hereditary prostate cancer is suboptimal for prostate cancer counseling
example.arg: Urologists' and GPs' knowledge of hereditary prostate cancer

roleset.note: SUBOPTIMAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus. Relation to 'optimize.01'. (from suboptimal.01-j)
